message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to counteroffer at $160.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $170. Let me know if that works for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $165.
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I can do $172, but that's as low as I can go. Let me know if that's acceptable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position. I would like to counteroffer at $168.
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I can do $175, but that's as low as I can go. Let me know if that's acceptable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to counteroffer at $170.
I'm really close to my minimum, Bob. I can do $178, but that's as low as I can go. Let me know if that's acceptable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your time and effort. I would like to counteroffer at $175.
